entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FormPipeReader modifies the readonly input buffer #48251
  • Optimize DefaultHubLifetimeManager.OnDisconnectedAsync when there are thousands of unsubscribed groups #48249
  • Make RDG handle names that are escaped keywords #48248
  • Default EventSourceSupport to true in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #48247
    8.0-preview5
  • InputText with a property that has a MaxLength data annotation should generate a maxlength attribute #48246
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #48245
  • FileBufferingReadStream CopyToAsync Performance problem when wrapped #48242
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery triggers OnParametersSet after Navigation using AuthorizeRouteView #48241
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Memory leak in Health Checks #48240
  • Signalr: Request for Optimized Client-Server Communication #48239
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware: Unique ID for Request/Response #48235

Closed

  • RDG does not support certain `RouteHandlerBuilder` extension methods #47196
    8.0-preview5
  • Pass JsonSerializerOptions to `ReadFromJsonAsync` calls in RDG #47145
    8.0-preview5
  • Optimize how EmitterContext is constructed in RDG #47147
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Exception thrown during Hot Reload #47926
  • Tab Switching leads to delay in content disposal #48036
  • asp.net mvc An unhandled exception occurred while processing the reques #48046
  • Blazor server Cascading Value refreshed wrong #48223
  • Blazor CSP - Directive unsafe-inline for styles #48204
  • Change access modifier of ForceSignOut() to protected virtual for improved extensibility and custom exception handling #48101
  • JavaScript interop calls cannot be issued at this time. This is because the circuit has disconnected and is being disposed #48220
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #48222
  • Perf regression: mapaction #48231

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for IResults with explicit interface implementations #48250
    area-web-frameworks
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #48243
    area-infrastructure
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc
  • Avoid delegate shuffle thunks in StringUtilities #48234
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Allow declaring render modes, and emit the corresponding markers into HTML #48190
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove rules associated with the auto-merge label #48227
    area-infrastructure
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    needs-area-label
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    area-mvc
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime
